title: Get to Know Filter Views
text: A filter view in Google Sheets is like a temporary setting that lets you sort and filter your data without changing the original layout of the spreadsheet for others. Think of it like a customized lens through which you can view your data.

title: Collaboration and Filters
text: When working with others on the same sheet, creating a filter view enables you to apply filters without altering how the data appears to your collaborators. This can ensure shared work is uninterrupted.

title: Returning to Your Filters Later
text: If you know you'll need the same filtered data repeatedly, saving a filter view allows you to access it quickly without reapplying all the filters.
